articles.author: Pamela McClintock
articles.title: Box Office: ‘Nobody 2’ Can’t Stop ‘Weapons’ as Sydney Sweeney’s ‘Americana’ All-Out Bombs - The Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: Spike Lee's Denzel Washington-starrer 'Highest 2 Lowest' also may be struggling in its limited theatrical debut before landing relatively quickly on Apple TV+.
articles.content: Bob Odenkirk’s modestly budgeted sequel Nobody 2 is having to settle for a third-place finish in its domestic box office debut as Zach Cregger’s horror pic, Weapons, continues to fire on all cylinder… [+2688 chars]

articles.author: Bryan Walsh
articles.title: The decline of drinking, explained in one chart - vox.com
articles.description: Only 54% of Americans say they drink alcohol now, the lowest ever. Teen drinking has plummeted even more. Here’s why declining consumption saves lives.
articles.content: Today, around 8,200 or so Americans will turn 21. Which means, of course, they will become eligible to engage in that time-honored habit of adulthood: drinking alcohol. (Im sure absolutely none of th… [+6569 chars]
